website_summaries.verdict: A high quality set of 2 hand blown glasses, set apart from the competition by their removable corona clips.
pros: The glasses are extra large, with a sturdy, removable clip to hold a beer in your margarita
There are beautiful blue accents along the rim and base of the glass
The glasses are hand blown, but still dishwasher safe
We found there was an authentic restaurant look and feel to the glasses
cons: Sits at a higher price point than competitors

customer_reviews.title: Substantial & Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These 2 margarita glasses arrived quickly & safely. Both glasses were perfect upon unpacking. These are beautiful, substantial, solid & artisan. The blue stripe around the rim of the glass is perfect. These 16oz glasses are stable & will hold a substantial drink. Feel great in my hand & delightful to look at. One glass was 1/4" higher than the other, but who cares? They are gorgeous & who will notice when filled with margaritas! I prefer the artisan quality to show. Seriously buy these glasses. They are classy & fun & make a statement among your bar & glassware.
customer_reviews.author: PolarPro

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order after seeing another customer received the glasses broken. One of my glasses arrived broken as well, and I'm glad I checked as this is supposed to be a gift. The other glasses seem sturdy and good looking. I will change to five stars if I can get a fourth, unbroken glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun presentation for a different margarita experience
customer_reviews.text: The glasses and corona clips arrived on time and well packaged and no breakage. This is an awesome presentation with the addition of the coronitas. The small bottle is perfect for inside the margarita glass. My guests loved the CoronaRitas and now want their own glasses and clips. I am very pleased with this product. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: carolyn s

customer_reviews.title: They arrived broken!!! Box was not damaged, but the glasses were broke.
customer_reviews.text: So excited to get these glasses in and they were both broken!!! No damage to the shipping box but glasses didn't survive the blown up wrapping. Very unhappy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and beautifully designed glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and beautifully designed glasses. They look great and they are an above average size glass which is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Craig C

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived broken. Packing material not compatible with fragile material.
customer_reviews.author: Maury

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product my wife loved them, the glass is sturdy and good quality. Perfect to try bar style margaritas at home
customer_reviews.author: Angel B.

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect Margarita glasses for someone looking for that authentic restaurant ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect Margarita glasses for someone looking for that authentic restaurant style glasses. They are quality made, heavier and thicker, and love the blue color accent on these! Great size too for filling it up with more booze! :)
customer_reviews.author: Cschrades21

customer_reviews.title: Great Margarita Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glasses, very thick so the Corona bottles don't tip them over. We ended up buying a 2nd set we liked them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love These Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Just loved these glasses & they arrived unbroken & on time for the event we needed them for!
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: gift for a friend
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stemware. Friend loves them, so glad I ordered a set for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken at arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of these glass and couldn’t wait for them to get here. However, when I opened the package, I was sad to see that one of them the base had been broken off of the stem.
customer_reviews.author: eashley0301

customer_reviews.title: My son loved them. Heavy and very well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought these glasses as a gift. My son loved them. Heavy and very well made. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Artz

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: One pretty glass...one completely shattered glass. Returning them ... bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

product_meta.title: Coronarita Margarita Glasses with Clip Handmade in Mexico - Set of 4, 16oz.
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:4| Size:16Handblown Mexican Margarita Glasses made in Mexico
feature_bullets: 16 oz. Handblown margarita glasses with Corona clips included for a complete Coronarita setup
Handmade and handblown with recyclced glass by craftsmen in Mexico. Find your playa in style while appreciating the age-old art of mexican blown glassware.
Introduced by the world-famous Chili's cocktail and now igniting happy hours the world by storm
